Description: Postcard; printed paper; monochrome (sepia) photograph showing ornamental public garden and monument to Nubar Pacha at Alexandria.
Curator's comments: Old card; postally used; postmarked 17th September but year indistinct and counter-stamped with triangular Armed Forces stamp; message reads: "Dear Friend, Just a line hoping they will find you and all at home are well as it leaves me at present Please accept my kindest regards Yours truly J Ryder". There is a counter-signature at the bottom. Acquired with EPH-ME 2919-2925 which are part of the same set, in the same condition and although not postally used probably originated from the same collection.
